last_episode_to_air.name: A Girl's Sacrifice (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: Emma's friends must save her when her plans go horribly wrong; Emma is forced to make several tough decisions.

name: Every Witch Way
overview: The series follows 14-year-old Emma Alonso, as she moves to Miami and her life turns upside-down. Not only does she discover that she is a witch, she also has a crush on the boy next door, Daniel. But Daniel’s ex-girlfriend Maddie, who is an 'evil witch' and leader of the school clique the 'Panthers', is still willing to fight for the boy she loves.

episodes.name: Discovery
episodes.overview: After moving to Miami, strange things begin to happen to Emma; Emma meets her new crush and his popular girlfriend.

episodes.name: The Big Rescue
episodes.overview: Emma and Maddie struggle to master their powers after discovering that they are witches; the Sharks set off a smoke bomb to get out of taking a test.

episodes.name: The Big Chill
episodes.overview: Maddie casts a spell on Emma that sends her to the nurse's office; Emma meets her magical guardian, Lily; Lily reveals that Emma's powers can be stolen.

episodes.name: I'm a Witch
episodes.overview: Emma's powers intensify when she finds the Hexoren; Maddie learns to undo spells; Diego tries to hide the discovery of his powers; Emma prepares for her first date with Daniel.

episodes.name: Magic Fight Club
episodes.overview: The principal grows suspicious after catching Emma and Maddie having a magical fight; Diego and Mac have crushes on Katie.

episodes.name: Monkey Business (1)
episodes.overview: Maddie attempts to use Tony's magic show to win back Daniel's affection; Lily discovers a secret about the principal.

episodes.name: Monkey Business (2)
episodes.overview: When Lily is turned into a monkey, Emma must find a way to turn her back; Diego explores his powers; the Sharks become suspicious.

episodes.name: Mac-sic-cle
episodes.overview: Emma and Daniel reconcile; the Panthers plan to steal the Hexoren; Diego's powers spiral out of control, endangering his friends.

episodes.name: I Said, Upside Down
episodes.overview: Maddie is more powerful than ever; Julio tells Diego the truth about his powers; Daniel tells Emma that he wants to date her.

episodes.name: I-Guana Dance with You
episodes.overview: The principal catches Maddie in the middle of a spell; Julio and Lily realize that they are both part of the magical realm; Emma is asked to erase Tony's memory.

episodes.name: I-Guana You Back
episodes.overview: Maddie romances an iguana, believing it is Daniel; the principal plans to steal the chosen one's powers at the eclipse.

episodes.name: I Heart Beau
episodes.overview: Maddie and the Panthers get to know the lizard-turned-boy, Beau; Diego discovers the origin of his powers.

episodes.name: Pantherized
episodes.overview: Emma and Tony must rescue Andi and reclaim the Hexoren.

episodes.name: Walk Like a Panther
episodes.overview: Andi must keep playing panther in an effort to get the Hexoren back.

episodes.name: Beach Ball
episodes.overview: Emotions run high between Emma and Daniel; Maddie and Diego make some revelations.

episodes.name: Lily Frog
episodes.overview: The principal pressures Andi to reveal the location of the Witches Council.

episodes.name: Witches' Flu
episodes.overview: Emma has trouble controlling her powers when she has the flu; the principal takes a special interest in Maddie.

episodes.name: Hexoren Squared
episodes.overview: The principal catches the T3 sneaking into the high school and makes a bold decision.

episodes.name: Which Witch Is Which
episodes.overview: Daniel learns the truth about Emma and Maddie; Diego discovers the principal's plans for the eclipse and seeks help.

episodes.name: The Chosen One
episodes.overview: The principal uses Daniel to lure Emma to an empty theater, where she plans to steal the chosen one's powers.

episodes.name: Jax of Hearts
episodes.overview: Emma and Daniel are finally dating, but Lily warns Emma that the Witches Council won't stand for it. Meanwhile, a new wizard, Jax, arrives at Iridium High.

episodes.name: Runaway Witch
episodes.overview: The Witches' Council confronts Emma about dating a human; Diego finds a way to improve Maddie's mood.

episodes.name: Love Pie Redux
episodes.overview: Jax gets Emma in trouble; Katie, Sophie and Diego try to convince Maddie that she has her powers back; Maddie's mother makes a special pie for Francisco.

episodes.name: Powers by Proxy
episodes.overview: Emma and Maddie receive some disturbing news; Jax tries to get Daniel in trouble; Andi finds a pair of magic goggles.

episodes.name: The Fool Moon
episodes.overview: Desdemona takes a job at Iridium High so she can help Emma through the full moon; Andi and Maddie discover Jax's true nature.

episodes.name: Daniel Who?
episodes.overview: Emma and Jax accidentally wipe out Daniel's entire memory after he sees Emma casting a spell; Diego tries to win Maddie's forgiveness.

episodes.name: No Can Do
episodes.overview: Emma has trouble controlling her powers during the Fool Moon; Jax shows his softer side; Diego discovers a new power.

episodes.name: Werewolves in Siberia
episodes.overview: After refusing to break up with Daniel, Agamemnon casts mysterious spells on Emma; Katie and Sophie are tired of Diego stealing Maddie's attention.

episodes.name: The No-Sleep Sleepover
episodes.overview: When Daniel, Diego and Jax crash a sleepover at Maddie's house, they encounter a mysterious creature.

episodes.name: Outta Hand
episodes.overview: Jax talks Emma into skipping school; Maddie learns who stole her powers; Diego is willing to risk everything to help Maddie.

episodes.name: Double Trouble
episodes.overview: Emma is out of control after learning a new cloning spell from Jax; Maddie and Diego investigate alternative ways to restore her powers.

episodes.name: The Emma Squad
episodes.overview: Emma's cloning spell makes her social life go haywire; Maddie asks Lily to help her strengthen her powers.

episodes.name: Missminion
episodes.overview: After finding out she has been hiding her powers from him, Daniel breaks up with Emma; Gigi prepares for an important newscast.

episodes.name: The Breakup
episodes.overview: Desdemona makes Gigi her minion; tensions are high between Daniel and Emma following their split; the T3 decide to prank Emma.

episodes.name: Emma Wants a Cracker
episodes.overview: When Emma turns herself into a bird, Daniel and Andi search for her; Maddie believes that Emma is at fault for her face showing moods.

episodes.name: Stormageddon
episodes.overview: A magical storm hits Miami; Jax and Emma are stuck at school together; Andi, Diego and Agamemnon are trapped at the Seven; Daniel and Maddie shelter at Daniel's house.

episodes.name: About a Wizard
episodes.overview: Jax makes a sacrifice for Emma; Desdemona wants to get Emma and Daniel back together; Maddie and Sophie plan a surprise party for Katie.

episodes.name: Beach Birthday Bash
episodes.overview: Desdemona casts a spell on Daniel at Katie's party; the T3 constructs their biggest prank, but cannot decide on the victim; Lily is suspicious of Desdemona.

episodes.name: Zombie Boyfriend
episodes.overview: The T3 pull a huge prank at the school play. Meanwhile, Andi's beloved video-game character comes to life; Maddie is told she must break up with Diego; and Lily is framed by Desdemona.

episodes.name: Andi & Philip, Sittin' in a Tree
episodes.overview: Andi helps her zombie boyfriend pass as a human; Katie forces Maddie to make her a boyfriend; Agamemnon begins to uncover Desdemona's plot.

episodes.name: BF-Never
episodes.overview: Emma and Andi's friendship is put in jeopardy; Agamemnon falls into harm's way; Diego discovers that he has the ability to create portals.

episodes.name: The Abyss
episodes.overview: Evil Emma tries to ruin Emma and Daniel's relationship; Diego and the Panthers receive a message; Andi makes a deal with Jax.

episodes.name: I'll Stop the World
episodes.overview: Emma and Daniel are in serious danger and must rely on Andi, the Pathers and the T3 to save them; Desdemona and Evil Emma make a pact to destroy the magical realm.

episodes.name: Emma vs. Emma
episodes.overview: Emma and her friends must stop Evil Emma and Desdemona from destroying the magical realm and taking over all of humankind.

episodes.name: Beachside 7
episodes.overview: Emma freezes time and cannot undo the spell. Meanwhile, a new witch named Mia shows up and causes some drama.

episodes.name: Rebel Emma
episodes.overview: Emma is sent to boot camp as punishment for casting spells in public; the T3 are framed for a prank that they did not commit.

episodes.name: It's Always You
episodes.overview: Emma discovers Mia flirting with Daniel; Andi is determined to become the first human Guardian; Diego learns more about being a Kanay.

episodes.name: Breaking All the Rules
episodes.overview: Emma and Andi try to break into the magic realm; Maddie and Diego want to repair the relationships between witches and Kanay; Mia causes trouble.

episodes.name: Neverending Summer
episodes.overview: Jax struggles with his final boot camp exam and is in danger of losing his powers forever; Mia creates a plot to get Daniel to do whatever she wants.

episodes.name: Daniel Darko
episodes.overview: Emma and Andi try to figure out what is causing Daniel's strange behavior; the T3 are framed for the Neverending Summer Party debacle.

episodes.name: No More Mr. Nice Guy
episodes.overview: Daniel continues to act strangely; Jax thinks that he has lost his powers; Mia schemes to become Katie's best friend.

episodes.name: Spider No More
episodes.overview: Mia and Daniel wreak havoc in the school and plot against Emma; Maddie tries to convince Katie that Mia is not her friend.

episodes.name: Back to Back
episodes.overview: A mysterious crystal magically binds Emma and Maddie together; Daniel becomes ill; the H2O pull a prank.

episodes.name: El Cristal de Caballero
episodes.overview: Emma and Andi are sure that Mia was responsible for Daniel's strange behavior, but they are unable to prove it; Jax and Andi search for the missing crystal piece.

episodes.name: Kanay vs. Kanay
episodes.overview: Maddie and Emma try to find a way out of the janitor's closet; Daniel and the Panthers search for Maddie and Emma; Diego and Mia grow closer.

episodes.name: Invisible Me
episodes.overview: When Jax accidentally makes Andi invisible, she takes advantage of her new status to try to trap Mia; Mia conspires with Katie against Emma.

episodes.name: The Truth About Kanays
episodes.overview: Emma and Jax search for a solution to Andi's invisibility; the Cristal de Caballero goes missing.

episodes.name: Zombie Rescue Team
episodes.overview: Mia's scheming reaches a peak when she freezes Andi; Diego is torn between helping Mia and standing by Andi.

episodes.name: Kangaroo Jax
episodes.overview: When Jax refuses to share information about Emma's powers, the council turns him into a kangaroo; Daniel and Andi must make sure that Phillip behaves at school.

episodes.name: Defiance
episodes.overview: Emma and Daniel must find the kangaroo before Francisco contacts animal control; Mia challenges Diego to a duel; Gigi tries to figure out who destroyed her video equipment.

episodes.name: Magical Throwdown
episodes.overview: Emma and Andi want to turn Phillip into a human; Gigi gives her memory card to Black Hawk; Diego trains for his duel with Mia.

episodes.name: The Kanay Strikes Back
episodes.overview: Emma and Andi struggle with turning Phillip into a human; Diego and Mia engage in a Kanay duel; Agamemnon and Desdemona try to stop Emma's plan.

episodes.name: New Wicth Order (1)
episodes.overview: When Emma and Mia are sucked into a video game, their friends must come to the rescue; Lily and the Panthers try to obtain Gigi's memory card and prevent the realm from being exposed

episodes.name: New Wicth Order (2)
episodes.overview: When Emma and Mia are sucked into a video game, their friends must come to the rescue; Lily and the Panthers try to obtain Gigi's memory card and prevent the realm from being exposed

episodes.name: A World Without You
episodes.overview: Emma has chosen Jax over Daniel and Daniel has disappeared. Emma tries to find out what has happened.

episodes.name: Road Trippin'
episodes.overview: When a magical private investigator gets a lead on Daniel's location, the gang takes a road trip.

episodes.name: Ever in the Everglades
episodes.overview: Emma finds Daniel and in the Everglades and wants him to remember his life in Miami. Everybody takes a ride on a airboat through the Everglades.

episodes.name: Stuck in a Storm
episodes.overview: Katie, Sophie and Gigi are lost in the Everglades as a big storm approaches - and an unexpected visitor turns up to rescue them.

episodes.name: A Tale of Two Lives
episodes.overview: Emma makes another Continuum break, which puts Daniel and his family in danger.

episodes.name: Twisted Sister
episodes.overview: Emma tries her best to restore Daniel's memory but time is running out. Jax meets his long lost sister.

episodes.name: Lunch at Lola's
episodes.overview: The gang goes to a restaurant in Miami named Lola's. They have a magical experience with Talia.

episodes.name: Monkey Face Emoji
episodes.overview: Daniel thinks that Maddie is his girlfriend. And Jax searches for information about his mother.

episodes.name: The Final Countdown
episodes.overview: Jax learns the truth about his family. Emma does everything she can to restore Daniel's memory in the few hours he has left.

episodes.name: Diego's Wipedown (1)
episodes.overview: After the Continuum break ends, Emma works hard to restore her relationship with Jax; Maddie tries to get Diego to forgive her.

episodes.name: Diego's Wipedown (2)
episodes.overview: After the Continuum break ends, Emma works hard to restore her relationship with Jax; Maddie tries to get Diego to forgive her.

episodes.name: Van Pelt Reunion
episodes.overview: Emma misses her mother and becomes consumed with finding out more about her. An unwelcomed guest shows up at the Van Pelt reunion.

episodes.name: Back to Square One
episodes.overview: Emma considers going back in time to save her mother. Daniel wants to return to the Everglades. Jake and Jessie go into hiding.

episodes.name: Power in a Bottle
episodes.overview: Jax discovers where Jake and Jessie are hiding; Emma continues to abuse her magic and strips the Council of its powers.

episodes.name: What If?
episodes.overview: Emma's search for a time manipulation spell causes a huge rift between her and Andi; Diego searches for more Kanays.

episodes.name: Frenemies
episodes.overview: Emma works to become more powerful in order to cast the time manipulation spell, even though it means alienating all of her friends. Jake attempts to see his family again.

episodes.name: Stop Emma
episodes.overview: Emma's friends decide they must stop her for good. Jake has surprising information for Jax.

episodes.name: Mommie Dearest
episodes.overview: The group stages a "witchervention" for Emma. Jax finally learns the truth about his family.

episodes.name: A Girl's Sacrifice (1)
episodes.overview: Emma's friends must save her when her plans go horribly wrong; Emma is forced to make several tough decisions.

episodes.name: A Girl's Sacrifice (2)
episodes.overview: Emma's friends must save her when her plans go horribly wrong; Emma is forced to make several tough decisions.
